meanings.sent1: The overembellished cake was covered in too many colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: Her overembellished outfit had sequins, bows, and glitter all over.
meanings.sent3: The overembellished room looked like a circus tent with all the bright decorations.
meanings.sent4: His overembellished stories were like fairy tales spun from thin air.
meanings.sent5: The overembellished painting was so busy that it hurt my eyes to look at it.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or embellished to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The overembellished movie poster made the film seem more exciting than it was.
meanings.sent2: She told an overembellished tale of how she caught the biggest fish in the lake.
meanings.sent3: His overembellished excuses for being late were always entertaining but never believable.
meanings.sent4: The overembellished rumors spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The overembellished praise he received made him feel like a superstar for a day.
